common.runtime.environment

Class RuntimeEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.CObject
      • common.runtime.environment.RuntimeEnv
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationRuntimeEnv, StageRuntimeEnv

    public class RuntimeEnv
extends CObject
    The RuntimeEnv class is a class for managing and parsing command line argument(s) for a stage and an application.
    Author:
    Vincent Mirian
    Date:
    Nov 13, 2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuntimeEnv(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initializes a newly created RuntimeEnv with command line argument(s), args.

      • getDefault

        protected java.lang.String getDefault(java.lang.String str)
        Returns the default value for string str that references a command line argument.
        Parameters:
        str - the command line argument
        Returns:
        the string default value for string str that references a command line argument if command line argument exists, otherwise null
